Text: Citing tax avoidance as another form of illicit financial flow, he quoted the Tax Justice Network and the International Monetary Fund to have estimated over $200 billion per year as being lost by developing countries when multinational enterprises do not pay taxes in the countries where they made the profit.
Cause: multinational enterprises do not pay taxes in the countries where they made the profit.
Effect: Citing tax avoidance as another form of illicit financial flow, he quoted the Tax Justice Network and the International Monetary Fund to have estimated over $200 billion per year as being lost by developing countries
Sentence: <e2>Citing tax avoidance as another form of illicit financial flow, he quoted the Tax Justice Network and the International Monetary Fund to have estimated over $200 billion per year as being lost by developing countries</e2> when <e1>multinational enterprises do not pay taxes in the countries where they made the profit.</e1>
